external_games.name: Rust Console Edition - New Cobalt Employee Welcome Pack

name: Rust: Console Edition - New Cobalt Employee Welcome Pack
summary:
Buy the New Cobalt Employee - Welcome Pack for Rust Console Edition.

Welcome to Cobalt. Our ‘New Cobalt Employee - Welcome Pack' has everything you need to start your new career with us. Out here on the frontier of science and technology, you'll need every advantage if you want to succeed. [Redacted]. Start your career with us in quintessential Cobalt style.

You will receive receive the following, Cobalt-themed items:
1500 Rust Coins
A customary rock skin
Standard-issue Cobalt jacket, trousers and shoes skins
Your very own Cobalt furnace skin
A cosy sleeping bag skin
A wooden door skin
